bill.title: Relating to educational opportunities for adults in custody.
bill.description: Authorizes adult in custody to enroll in academic program at any community college in state, any distance learning academic program or any other higher education academic program that adult in custody applies for and is accepted into, provided that enrollment in academic program is consistent with administrative rules and regulations adopted by Department of Corrections. history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Public Hearing and Possible Work Session scheduled.
